p.k: 85% Oscar-winning wartime romance starring Humphrey Bogart as an ex-pat bar owner torn between love and virtue. Ingrid Bergman co-stars as his former flame
68% Goldie Hawn busts her husband out of jail, kidnaps a cop and goes on the run in Texas. Crime drama from Steven Spielberg
New teacher Sidney Poitier tries to inspire the students of a rough east London school using his own unorthodox methods. Touching drama co-starring Lulu
71% Disgraced ex-bobsledder John Candy attempts to coach Jamaica's first ever bobsleigh team to an unlikely Olympic victory. Feelgood family favourite
75% A bet between two rich old brokers puts skint hustler Eddie Murphy on Wall St and snob Dan Aykroyd in the gutter. Classic John Landis comedy
Dustin Hoffman and Meryl Streep won Oscars for their roles in this landmark drama about two parents fighting for custody of their son. Poignant Best Picture winner
83% Grifters Robert Redford and Paul Newman try their hand at conning a fortune out of a murderous banker. Top crime caper
71% Disgraced ex-bobsledder John Candy attempts to coach Jamaica's first ever bobsleigh team to an unlikely Olympic victory. Feelgood family favourite
75% A bet between two rich old brokers puts skint hustler Eddie Murphy on Wall St and snob Dan Aykroyd in the gutter. Classic John Landis comedy
73% Nicolas Cage and John Travolta tear it up as a crook and a cop who swap faces in John Woo's superslick action extravaganza. With Joan Allen and Gina Gershon
77% Altar boy Edward Norton convinces hotshot lawyer Richard Gere to defend him in a murder case. Psychological thriller with strong language
63% In a world where aliens live among the human population, cop James Caan works with ET police detective Mandy Patinkin to track down his partner's killer. Sci-fi thriller
